Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Department of the Army  US Army Central
Additional Scope Comments: Army Corps of Engineers, RG 77, Office of the Surgeon General RG 112, Army Staff RG 319,  Army Secretariat RG 335, Army Special Operations Command  RG 338, Army Space & Missile Defense Command RG 338,  Army Surface Deployment & Distribution Command RG 338, US Army South RG 338, US Army North/5th Army RG 338, US Army Africa RG 338, Army Materiel Command RG 544, US Army Europe RG 549, US Army Pacific RG 550, Army Training & Doctrine Command RG 553, Army Forces Command RG 555.Other emails will be managed using standard Records Management practices based on content of the email.  They will be placed into electronic folders in the Army Records Information Management System (ARIMS).  Army is also pursuing other automated records management solutions with DOD and other DOD Components for use in automated processing of all electronic records.
Legacy Email Scope: Agency will be including legacy email dating back to 2013, as the email journaling policy defined in the Army Regulation 25-400-2 Army Records Information Management System was in place prior to Capstone.
Whom should NARA contact if there any qu: Anthony D. Crawley-Gibson,  Chief, Army Records Management Division, Anthony.d.crawley-gibson.civ@mail.mil ,  703-428-6464

Additional Scope Comments: All account holders other than Capstone account holders will be covered by Item 011.All email will be cutoff for Capstone account holders at the end of employee tenure.  Transfer 25 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: The Library will be including legacy e-mail for all account holders dating back to approximately 2010.  Prior to 2010 the Library incorporated a print and file policy for email.
